issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
After setting ti.ui.defaultunit to "mm" in tiapp.xml the layouts using percentage sizes stopped working.

I had a horizontal layout with two child views, both specifying 50% as width. With ti.ui.defaultunit unset the layout is displayed properly. With ti.ui.defaultunit set to "mm" the centres of the child views are still in the same place but their width is wrong (far too small).
fields.summary: iOS: Layout with sizes specified as percentage not working after setting ti.ui.defaultunit

comments.body:
Hi,

Please provide a test cast to reproduce your problem. That will be really helpful. Thanks.

Regards,
Shuo
